briefTitle: Evaluation of Inter-reader Reliability Using Images From Subjects With Alzheimer's Disease (AD) or Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI)
officialTitle: Evaluation of Physician Training for Interpretation of Florbetapir-PET Scans: Evaluation of Inter-reader Reliability Using Images From Subjects With a Clinical Presentation of AD or MCI
summary: Re-read of brain amyloid scans acquired in previous AV-45 clinical studies by readers trained using updated reading methodology. The scans in this study came from subjects who had Alzheimer's Disease (AD) or Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI).
